add-user-to-group-chat.bad-chat-type: Cannot add people to chat of this type.
add-user-to-group-chat.i-am-not-in-chat: Cannot add users to chat to which you do not belong to.
add-user-to-group-chat.user-already-in-chat: User is already in this chat.
add-user-to-group-chat.failure: Cannot add user to this chat.

create-group-chat.not-belonging-to-you: Cannot create group chat not belonging to you.

create-message.user-not-belonging-to-chat: You cannot send a message to this chat.
create-message.response-not-existent: Message of this responseId does not exist in this chat.

create-private-chat.not-belonging-to-you: Cannot create private chat not belonging to you.

create-reaction.bad-chat: You cannot create reaction in chat not belonging to you.
create-reaction.bad-message: Cannot create reaction to a message that is not in given chat.

delete-self-from-chat.bad-chat-type: Cannot remove yourself from chat of this type.
delete-self-from-chat.not-belonging-to-you: Cannot remove yourself from chat which you do not belong to.

get-messages.unauthorized: You cannot read messages from this chat.

update-group-chat.unauthorized: Cannot update chat you do not belong to.
update-group-chat.bad-type: Cannot update chat of this type.

update-alias.unauthorized: Cannot set aliases in chat you do not belong to.
update-alias.user-not-in-chat: This user doesn't belong to this chat.

get-file.wrong-filter: Have to apply one of the filters:
get-file.bad-chat: Chat has to be a string.
get-file.bad-post: Post has to be a string.
get-file.avatar-not-found: Cannot find avatar of this name.
get-file.group-photo-not-found: Cannot find chat photo of this name.

insert-to-cache.no-file: Attach a file to upload it.
insert-to-cache.limit-reached: Cache limit reached. Maximum number of files in cache: {{count}}

accept.unauthorized: Cannot accept friendship not being meant to be accepted by you.

create.unauthorized: Cannot create friendship not requested by you.

delete.unauthorized: Cannot delete friendship not belonging to you.
Cannot delete post not belonging to you.

update.unauthorized: Cannot edit post not belonging to you.
